original_text: The king of Israel was very upset. He said, ‘What has happened? Perhaps the Lord has brought us three kings here to put us under the power of the king of Moab!’
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 이르되 슬프다 여호와께서 이 세 왕을 불러 모아 모압의 손에 넘기려 하시는도다 하니

sentences.original_text: The king of Israel was very upset.
Perhaps the Lord has brought us three kings here
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 주께서 우리를 이곳에 세 왕과 함께 데려오셨을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: to put us under the power of the king of Moab!
sentences.korean_translation: 우리를 모압 왕의 권세 아래 두기 위함인가!
